q: Defense Donald Rumsfeld . The senator from Arizona gave a terse response Thursday to claims made in Donald Rumsfeld 's new book "Known and Unknown." Donald Rumsfeld had claimed John McCain had a "hair-trigger temper" and a propensity to shift his positions to appeal to the media. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. a defense that is ranked fifth overall in the NFL. Led by defensive player-of-the-year favorite Clay Matthews with 13 1/2 sacks, the Packers are tied for second behind the Steelers in bringing down quarterbacks. Those guys fly around the ball and are always in good position, Michael Vick said of the Packers' defense. "You just have to be ready for what they're going to do. They give you a lot of different looks and try to confuse you."
